parameters.description: The starting point for pagination. A value of 0 starts from the first item.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return. Useful for pagination and controlling data payload size.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Filter items relevant to a specific date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).
parameters.name: date

parameters.description: Include items that occurred before the specified date in ISO format.
parameters.name: before_date

parameters.description: Filter for items after the specified date. Use with `before_date` for a range. Date in ISO format.
parameters.name: after_date

parameters.description: Filter the list based on item status. Accepts multiple values from the predefined list.
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: Filter the list based on the item type. Supports multiple values from the predefined list.
parameters.name: kind

current.description: URL to fetch the current page

first.description: URL to fetch the first page

completed_at.description: Completion date when status is "done" or "error"

custom_metadata.description: Custom metadata given in the initial request

error_code.description: HTTP status code of the error if status is "error"

filename.description: The name of the uploaded file

number_of_channels.description: Number of channels in the audio file

source.description: The link used to download the file if audio_url was used

file.description: The file data you uploaded. Can be null if status is "error"

post_session_metadata.description: For debugging purposes, send data that could help to identify issues

audio_to_llm.description: **[Alpha]** Enable audio to llm processing for this audio

prompts.description: The list of prompts applied on the audio transcription
example: Extract the key points from the transcription

audio_to_llm_config.description: **[Alpha]** Audio to llm configuration, if `audio_to_llm` is enabled

callback.description: Enable callback for this transcription. If true, the `callback_config` property will be used to customize the callback behaviour

allOf.description: The HTTP method to be used. Allowed values are `POST` or `PUT` (default: `POST`)

method.description: The HTTP method to be used. Allowed values are `POST` or `PUT` (default: `POST`)

url.description: The URL to be called with the result of the transcription

callback_config.description: Customize the callback behaviour (url and http method)

callback_url.description: **[Deprecated]** Use `callback`/`callback_config` instead. Callback URL we will do a `POST` request to with the result of the transcription

languages.description: Specify the languages you want to use when detecting multiple languages

items.description: Specify the language in which it will be pronounced when sound comparison occurs. Default to transcription language.

code_switching_config.description: **[Deprecated]** Use `language_config` instead. Specify the configuration for code switching

context_prompt.description: **[Deprecated]** Context to feed the transcription model with for possible better accuracy

custom_spelling.description: **[Alpha]** Enable custom spelling for this audio

spelling_dictionary.description: The list of spelling applied on the audio transcription

custom_spelling_config.description: **[Alpha]** Custom spelling configuration, if `custom_spelling` is enabled

custom_vocabulary.description: **[Beta]** Can be either boolean to enable custom_vocabulary for this audio or an array with specific vocabulary list to feed the transcription model with

default_intensity.description: Default intensity for the custom vocabulary

vocabulary.description: Specific vocabulary list to feed the transcription model with. Each item can be a string or an object with the following properties: value, intensity, pronunciations, language.

intensity.description: The global intensity of the feature.

allOf.description: Specify the language in which it will be pronounced when sound comparison occurs. Default to transcription language.

language.description: Specify the language in which it will be pronounced when sound comparison occurs. Default to transcription language.

pronunciations.description: The pronunciations used in the transcription.

value.description: The text used to replace in the transcription.

custom_vocabulary_config.description: **[Beta]** Custom vocabulary configuration, if `custom_vocabulary` is enabled

detect_language.description: **[Deprecated]** Use `language_config` instead. Detect the language from the given audio

diarization.description: Enable speaker recognition (diarization) for this audio

max_speakers.description: Maximum number of speakers in the audio

min_speakers.description: Minimum number of speakers in the audio

number_of_speakers.description: Exact number of speakers in the audio

diarization_config.description: Speaker recognition configuration, if `diarization` is enabled

display_mode.description: **[Alpha]** Allows to change the output display_mode for this audio. The output will be reordered, creating new utterances when speakers overlapped

enable_code_switching.description: **[Deprecated]** Use `language_config` instead.Detect multiple languages in the given audio

allOf.description: Specify the language in which it will be pronounced when sound comparison occurs. Default to transcription language.

language.description: **[Deprecated]** Use `language_config` instead. Set the spoken language for the given audio (ISO 639 standard)

code_switching.description: If true, language will be auto-detected on each utterance. Otherwise, language will be auto-detected on first utterance and then used for the rest of the transcription. If one language is set, this option will be ignored.

languages.description: If one language is set, it will be used for the transcription. Otherwise, language will be auto-detected by the model.

items.description: Specify the language in which it will be pronounced when sound comparison occurs. Default to transcription language.

name_consistency.description: **[Alpha]** Enable names consistency for this audio

named_entity_recognition.description: **[Alpha]** Enable named entity recognition for this audio

punctuation_enhanced.description: **[Alpha]** Use enhanced punctuation for this audio

sentiment_analysis.description: Enable sentiment analysis for this audio

structured_data_extraction.description: **[Alpha]** Enable structured data extraction for this audio

classes.description: The list of classes to extract from the audio transcription

structured_data_extraction_config.description: **[Alpha]** Structured data extraction configuration, if `structured_data_extraction` is enabled

subtitles.description: Enable subtitles generation for this transcription

formats.description: Subtitles formats you want your transcription to be formatted to

items.description: Subtitles formats you want your transcription to be formatted to

maximum_characters_per_row.description: Maximum number of characters per row in a subtitle

maximum_duration.description: Maximum duration of a subtitle in seconds

maximum_rows_per_caption.description: Maximum number of rows per caption

minimum_duration.description: Minimum duration of a subtitle in seconds

allOf.description: Style of the subtitles. Compliance mode refers to : https://loc.gov/preservation/digital/formats//fdd/fdd000569.shtml#:~:text=SRT%20files%20are%20basic%20text,alongside%2C%20example%3A%20%22MyVideo123

style.description: Style of the subtitles. Compliance mode refers to : https://loc.gov/preservation/digital/formats//fdd/fdd000569.shtml#:~:text=SRT%20files%20are%20basic%20text,alongside%2C%20example%3A%20%22MyVideo123

subtitles_config.description: Configuration for subtitles generation if `subtitles` is enabled

allOf.description: The type of summarization to apply

type.description: The type of summarization to apply

context.description: Context information to improve translation accuracy

context_adaptation.description: Enables or disables context-aware translation features that allow the model to adapt translations based on provided context.

informal.description: Forces the translation to use informal language forms when available in the target language.

lipsync.description: Whether to apply lipsync to the translated transcription.

match_original_utterances.description: Align translated utterances with the original ones

allOf.description: Model you want the translation model to use to translate

model.description: Model you want the translation model to use to translate

target_languages.description: Target language in `iso639-1` format you want the transcription translated to

items.description: Target language in `iso639-1` format you want the transcription translated to

success.description: The audio intelligence model succeeded to get a valid output

translation.description: If `translation` has been enabled, translation of the audio speech transcription

result.description: Pre-recorded transcription's result when status is "done"

status.description: "queued": the job has been queued. "processing": the job is being processed. "done": the job has been processed and the result is available. "error": an error occurred during the job's processing.

completed_at.description: Completion date when status is "done" or "error"

custom_metadata.description: Custom metadata given in the initial request

error_code.description: HTTP status code of the error if status is "error"

filename.description: The name of the uploaded file

number_of_channels.description: Number of channels in the audio file

source.description: The link used to download the file if audio_url was used

file.description: The file data you uploaded. Can be null if status is "error"

post_session_metadata.description: For debugging purposes, send data that could help to identify issues

allOf.description: The bit depth of the audio stream

bit_depth.description: The bit depth of the audio stream

callback.description: If true, messages will be sent to configured url.

receive_acknowledgments.description: If true, acknowledgments will be sent to the defined callback.

receive_errors.description: If true, errors will be sent to the defined callback.

receive_final_transcripts.description: If true, final transcript will be sent to the defined callback.

receive_lifecycle_events.description: If true, lifecycle events will be sent to the defined callback.

receive_partial_transcripts.description: If true, partial transcript will be sent to the defined callback.

receive_post_processing_events.description: If true, post-processing events will be sent to the defined callback.

receive_pre_processing_events.description: If true, pre-processing events will be sent to the defined callback.

receive_realtime_processing_events.description: If true, realtime processing events will be sent to the defined callback.

receive_speech_events.description: If true, begin and end speech events will be sent to the defined callback.

url.description: URL on which we will do a `POST` request with configured messages

channels.description: The number of channels of the audio stream

allOf.description:
The encoding format of the audio stream. Supported formats: 
- PCM: 8, 16, 24, and 32 bits 
- A-law: 8 bits 
- -law: 8 bits 

Note: No need to add WAV headers to raw audio as the API supports both formats.

encoding.description:
The encoding format of the audio stream. Supported formats: 
- PCM: 8, 16, 24, and 32 bits 
- A-law: 8 bits 
- -law: 8 bits 

Note: No need to add WAV headers to raw audio as the API supports both formats.

endpointing.description: The endpointing duration in seconds. Endpointing is the duration of silence which will cause an utterance to be considered as finished

code_switching.description: If true, language will be auto-detected on each utterance. Otherwise, language will be auto-detected on first utterance and then used for the rest of the transcription. If one language is set, this option will be ignored.

languages.description: If one language is set, it will be used for the transcription. Otherwise, language will be auto-detected by the model.

items.description: Specify the language in which it will be pronounced when sound comparison occurs. Default to transcription language.

maximum_duration_without_endpointing.description: The maximum duration in seconds without endpointing. If endpointing is not detected after this duration, current utterance will be considered as finished

receive_acknowledgments.description: If true, acknowledgments will be sent to websocket.

receive_errors.description: If true, errors will be sent to websocket.

receive_final_transcripts.description: If true, final transcript will be sent to websocket.

receive_lifecycle_events.description: If true, lifecycle events will be sent to websocket.

receive_partial_transcripts.description: If true, partial transcript will be sent to websocket.

receive_post_processing_events.description: If true, post-processing events will be sent to websocket.

receive_pre_processing_events.description: If true, pre-processing events will be sent to websocket.

receive_realtime_processing_events.description: If true, realtime processing events will be sent to websocket.

receive_speech_events.description: If true, begin and end speech events will be sent to websocket.

allOf.description: The model used to process the audio. "solaria-1" is used by default.

model.description: The model used to process the audio. "solaria-1" is used by default.

chapterization.description: If true, generates chapters for the whole transcription.

summarization.description: If true, generates summarization for the whole transcription.

allOf.description: The type of summarization to apply

type.description: The type of summarization to apply

audio_enhancer.description: If true, apply pre-processing to the audio stream to enhance the quality.

speech_threshold.description: Sensitivity configuration for Speech Threshold. A value close to 1 will apply stricter thresholds, making it less likely to detect background sounds as speech.

custom_spelling.description: If true, enable custom spelling for the transcription.

spelling_dictionary.description: The list of spelling applied on the audio transcription

custom_spelling_config.description: Custom spelling configuration, if `custom_spelling` is enabled

custom_vocabulary.description: If true, enable custom vocabulary for the transcription.

default_intensity.description: Default intensity for the custom vocabulary

vocabulary.description: Specific vocabulary list to feed the transcription model with. Each item can be a string or an object with the following properties: value, intensity, pronunciations, language.

intensity.description: The global intensity of the feature.

allOf.description: Specify the language in which it will be pronounced when sound comparison occurs. Default to transcription language.

language.description: Specify the language in which it will be pronounced when sound comparison occurs. Default to transcription language.

pronunciations.description: The pronunciations used in the transcription.

value.description: The text used to replace in the transcription.

custom_vocabulary_config.description: Custom vocabulary configuration, if `custom_vocabulary` is enabled

named_entity_recognition.description: If true, enable named entity recognition for the transcription.

sentiment_analysis.description: If true, enable sentiment analysis for the transcription.

translation.description: If true, enable translation for the transcription

context.description: Context information to improve translation accuracy

context_adaptation.description: Enables or disables context-aware translation features that allow the model to adapt translations based on provided context.

informal.description: Forces the translation to use informal language forms when available in the target language.

lipsync.description: Whether to apply lipsync to the translated transcription.

match_original_utterances.description: Align translated utterances with the original ones

allOf.description: Model you want the translation model to use to translate

model.description: Model you want the translation model to use to translate

target_languages.description: Target language in `iso639-1` format you want the transcription translated to

items.description: Target language in `iso639-1` format you want the transcription translated to

allOf.description: The sample rate of the audio stream

sample_rate.description: The sample rate of the audio stream

channel.description: Audio channel of where this utterance has been transcribed from

confidence.description: Confidence on the transcribed utterance (1 = 100% confident)

end.description: End timestamp in seconds of this utterance

allOf.description: Specify the language in which it will be pronounced when sound comparison occurs. Default to transcription language.

start.description: Start timestamp in seconds of this utterance

words.description: List of words of the utterance, split by timestamp

confidence.description: Confidence on the transcribed word (1 = 100% confident)

end.description: End timestamps in seconds of the spoken word

start.description: Start timestamps in seconds of the spoken word

message.description: Detailed message of the addon error

status_code.description: Status code of the addon error

error.description: `null` if `success` is `true`. Contains the error details of the failed model

exec_time.description: Time audio intelligence model took to complete the task

is_empty.description: The audio intelligence model returned an empty value

results.description: List of translated transcriptions, one for each `target_languages`

message.description: Detailed message of the addon error

status_code.description: Status code of the addon error

error.description: Contains the error details of the failed addon

full_transcript.description: All transcription on text format without any other information

languages.description: All the detected languages in the audio sorted from the most detected to the less detected

items.description: Target language in `iso639-1` format you want the transcription translated to

sentences.description: If `sentences` has been enabled, sentences results for this translation

status_code.description: Status code of the addon error

error.description: `null` if `success` is `true`. Contains the error details of the failed model

exec_time.description: Time audio intelligence model took to complete the task

is_empty.description: The audio intelligence model returned an empty value

results.description: If `sentences` has been enabled, transcription as sentences.

success.description: The audio intelligence model succeeded to get a valid output

subtitles.description: If `subtitles` has been enabled, subtitles results for this translation

allOf.description: Subtitles formats you want your transcription to be formatted to

utterances.description: Transcribed speech utterances present in the audio

channel.description: Audio channel of where this utterance has been transcribed from

confidence.description: Confidence on the transcribed utterance (1 = 100% confident)

end.description: End timestamp in seconds of this utterance

allOf.description: Specify the language in which it will be pronounced when sound comparison occurs. Default to transcription language.

start.description: Start timestamp in seconds of this utterance

success.description: The audio intelligence model succeeded to get a valid output

translation.description: If `translation` has been enabled, translation of the audio speech transcription

result.description: Live transcription's result when status is "done"

status.description: "queued": the job has been queued. "processing": the job is being processed. "done": the job has been processed and the result is available. "error": an error occurred during the job's processing.

next.description: URL to fetch the next page

summary: Get the history of all your jobs
